text: @WHO @WHOThailand @WHOKobe @WHOSEARO @WHOWPRO Place an OZONE MACHINE in  a central location in your home. Spray nose and throat with MESOSILVER going out and coming in. Mesosilver taken internally can cure the virus in a few days. I had SARS and was dying for three months. Mesosilver cured me in 10 days. DO IT!
